subject: Snowboarding
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: The halfpipe team will be announced late Saturday, after back-to-back nights of contests in the same halfpipe where Kevin Pearce sustained a brain injury Dec. 31.
snippet: The halfpipe team will be announced late Saturday, after back-to-back nights of contests in the same halfpipe where Kevin Pearce sustained a brain injury Dec. 31.
